This wiki contains community-contributed guides, tutorials, and resources for Praetbot.

## What is Praetbot?

Praetbot is an open-source Discord bot written in TypeScript with:

- üç™ **Cookie System**: Track and reward user engagement
- üí¨ **Custom Commands**: Create your own JavaScript-powered commands
- üå§Ô∏è **Built-in Commands**: Weather, XKCD, random user picker, and more
- üåê **Web Interface**: View stats and manage the bot via HTTP
- üê≥ **Easy Deployment**: Deploy to AWS, Heroku, Railway, or anywhere
- üìñ **Open Source**: MIT licensed, contributions welcome!

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Node.js >= 20.0.0
- MongoDB database (free tier available on MongoDB Atlas)
- Discord Bot Token ([Get one here](https://discord.com/developers/applications))

### Quick Install

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/maniator/praetbot.git
cd praetbot

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Configure environment variables
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your credentials

# Start the bot
npm start
```

For detailed installation instructions, see the [main README](https://github.com/maniator/praetbot/blob/main/README.md).

## Contributing to the Wiki

This wiki is community-driven! You can:

1. **Edit existing pages** - Fix typos, add examples, improve clarity
2. **Create new pages** - Share your guides and tutorials
3. **Add command examples** - Share your best custom commands
4. **Translate pages** - Help make Praetbot accessible worldwide

### How to Edit

1. Click "Edit" on any wiki page
2. Make your changes in Markdown
3. Add a description of your changes
4. Click "Save Page"

### Guidelines

- Use clear, simple language
- Include code examples
- Test your instructions before posting
- Credit sources and original authors
- Be respectful and constructive

1. Search the wiki (top right search box)
2. Check the [FAQ](FAQ)
